item.description:
Hey all, the previous encounter with the Philly Hawks that was postponed due to flooded fields earlier this year has been rescheduled for September 19 at 3pm in Lexington.

This is traditionally a great clash between the 2 clubs and should be a great day out with the big tent up, bbq firing up and the good old suburban Aussie Rules feeling in Boston!

The location is close, just off route 128/95 20 mins from Boston at Minuteman Regional High Scool at 758 Marrett Road Lexington, MA 02421.

For directions for directions go to;

http://maps.google.co...

Hope to see you there with your friends, kids, family members and pets. Will be a great day out!

Damo the Demon

p.s. Unfortunately we can have no OPEN containers of alcohol there we ask that you please respect the wishes of the school. (chances are you are an aussie and like to drink at a sporting event-keep it undercover)

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Demons V Philidalphia Hawks
